data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Nakhon Phanom, Thailand to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nakhon Phanom, Thailand
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 759,840 who are far from you in Nakhon Phanom, Thailand from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the state of Nakhon Phanom an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Nakhon Phanom, Thailand that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Yoy people.
Spirit, help the people of the the state of Nakhon Phanom to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Nakhon Phanom, Thailand.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.section_summary:
the state of Nakhon Phanom, Thailand has a population of 769,900.

We estimate Nakhon Phanom has 4,978 people who might know Jesus, 5,082 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 759,840 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 154 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help the 4,978 believers in Nakhon Phanom to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.
